content.raw: Thank you! I still think `*args, **kwargs` are not really convenient even without _iterator_ though, because you still have to type out _target_, _processes_ and _timeout_; to me it makes more sense to have _args_ and _kwargs_ as two regular arguments unpacked inside `map()`. I’m not saying it because I’m too lazy to do it myself, just running it by you on a related note.
content.html: Thank you! I still think *args, **kwargs are not really convenient even without iterator though, because you still have to type out target, processes and timeout; to me it makes more sense to have args and kwargs as two regular arguments unpacked inside map(). I’m not saying it because I’m too lazy to do it myself, just running it by you on a related note.
